Articles.Content:
I am running into a repeating crash to desktop. It occurs either during missions or when entering a building in the KSC.

I am running the steam version of KSP 1.0.5 with several mods installed via CKAN. Additionally Ive installed the newest Devbuild of Mechjeb (524) and KW Rocketry with the community update for 1.0.5 - though the crashes occured prior to installing KW. I cant realy figure out whats causing the crashes. Maybe someone can help me or point me to the mod that I should uninstall.

Here are the links to my output and error logs.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/32d84kaucfatygx/error.log?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/qpsd5ab75aygqbl/output_log.txt?dl=0

Thanks for any helpful advice

Edited November 15, 2015 by Zelvik

A List of the installed mods:

KSP: 1.0.5 (Win32) - Unity: 4.6.4f1 - OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit

USI Tools - 0.5.3

Behemoth Aerospace Engineering Large Parts - 1.3.4

CapCom Mission Control On The Go - 1.0.1.3

Chatterer - 0.9.7.86

Community Resource Pack - 0.4.7

Contract Configurator - 1.8

Contract Pack: Field Research - 1.1.2

Contract Pack: Initial Contracts - 1.0.5

Contract Pack: Kerbal Space Station - 3.0.2

Contract Pack: RemoteTech - 2.0.1

Contracts Window Plus - 1.0.5.4

Crowd Sourced Science - 3.0.2

DMagic Orbital Science - 1.0.9.1

Ferram Aerospace Research - 0.15.5.3

Firespitter - 7.1.5

RasterPropMonitor - 0.24

Kerbal Attachment System - 0.5.5

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement - 3.1.4

Kerbal Inventory System - 1.2.3

KSP-AVC Plugin - 1.1.5

KW-Rocketry-Community-Fixes - 0.4

Modular Rocket Systems - 1.10

ModularFlightIntegrator - 1.1.2

Final Frontier - 0.8.9.1414

Procedural Parts - 1.1.8

RemoteTech - 1.6.9

SCANsat - 1.1.4.4

TweakScale - 2.2.5

USI Core - 0.1.2

UKS - 0.31.12

USI-LS - 0.1.4

Universal Storage - 1.1.0.8
Hi Zelvik, your output_log link isn't working, can you fix it please.

Have all of those mods been updated to version 1.0.5 because if they havent that is most likely your issue. I would remove all mods and add them in 1 by 1 until you find the offending one, also have you checked your memory usage you may simply be running out of memory

According to CKAN they are all updated for 1.0.5. Ive done a clean install after the 1.0.5 update and only added mods that were marked compatible with the latest release.

Fixed the link to the output log, should work now.

- - - Updated - - -

Have all of those mods been updated to version 1.0.5 because if they havent that is most likely your issue. I would remove all mods and add them in 1 by 1 until you find the offending one, also have you checked your memory usage you may simply be running out of memory

That seems to be the problem. Ive installed the graphic memory monitor and it quickly went into the red after starting the game. Honestly I am a bit at a loss here, as Ive run much more heavly modded versions of KSP without ever experiencing any crashes. Is there any way to bring it down. I ve already installed the active textrue management, anything else I could do apart from reducing the resolution?
You can switch to opengl its always lowered the memory for me and not hampered performance at all
